mapper.select: select u.id,u.userName,u.`passWord`,u.`name`,r.id roleId,r.`name` roleName,u.sex,u.age,u.entryDate,u.leaveDate,u.phone,u.email,u.loginDate,u.state from t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur on u.id=ur.userId LEFT JOIN t_role r on ur.roleId=r.id where u.userName=#{userName} and u.`password`=#{passWord}
mapper.update: update t_user u set u.loginDate=#{time} where u.id=#{id}
